arrival: You land on the s_current_planet_body_type s_current_planet. Here you must pick up the cargo to deliver to s_cargo_destination_planet.
Find the person that has to give you the cargo
picked_up: You find a shady man who calls himself s_random_name. He quickly hands you a suspiciously-looking sealed crate with "do not open" written on it, and promptly leaves. You deliver it to your ship without asking questions
Undock and fly to the next stop with the crate.
